about_the_game:
Gunning Over It is a frustrating casual game where you control guns and try to shoot your way up to fame and glory! Inspired by 'Getting Over It!', 'Jump King' and other similar games. You must time your shots and control your momentum to overcome several obstacles in your way. If you fail to do so, you may - lose - everything! Shoot your way through a spooky castle, a crazy circus and icy platforms and find the secret that is hiding in the summit!

Features

  • Highly addictive game loop!
  • Put your reflexes and skills to the test
  • Find and use different guns like Shotguns, Revolvers, Rifles etc.
  • Find and unlock cosmetics and paints
  • Climb your way through Dungeons filled with mini bosses
  • Evil Clowns
  • Ghosts
  • Revolutionary State of the Art 'Gun-Type' game

name: Gunning Over It! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 740 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower Rated Hardware is likely also supported, just untested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower Rated Hardware is likely also supported, just untested.

short_description: Gunning Over It! is a highly frustrating casual game where you play as a gun trying to overcome obstacles and climb the mountain!
